item.title: The unlikely rise of Karyn Tomlinson, who traveled to France in her 20s to learn how to cook and just won the culinary world’s most prestigious award
item.description: At age 32, she moved to northern Sweden to apprentice at a mythic institution with 2 Michelin stars.

item.title: Bitcoin blows past $120,000 for first time as BlackRock ETF investors pile in
item.description: The asset management giant saw an influx of $2.4 billion into its crypto investment products last week.

item.title: I’m leading the largest global law firm as AI transforms the legal profession. Lawyers must double down on this one skill
item.description: AI can handle the mechanics of law, but what makes a lawyer indispensable goes further than processing power.

item.title: A new way to eat: How to fix a food system that leaves us vulnerable and hurts the environment
item.description: Sustainability can be baked into our food system from seed to shelf, as the Big Food Redesign Challenge demonstrates.

item.title: EU warns Italy over meddling in UniCredit’s Banco BPM takeover
item.description: In a legal move that sets up a power struggle between Brussels and Rome, EU officials accused Italy's government of potentially violating EU law in im...
